title: I Ching Hexagram Data
description: Schema for the structure of I Ching hexagram data.

number.description: The unique number of the hexagram (1-64).

name.description: The common English name and theme of the hexagram.

chineseName.description: The Chinese character representing the hexagram.

judgment.description: The overall judgment or core meaning of the hexagram.

image.description: The symbolic imagery associated with the hexagram and its interpretation.

lines.description: An array detailing the meaning of each of the six lines.

type.description: The type of the line (yin or yang).

meaning.description: The specific meaning or interpretation of this line.

upperTrigram.description: The name of the upper trigram.

lowerTrigram.description: The name of the lower trigram.

trigramSignificance.description: Details about the symbolism and relationship of the constituent trigrams.

upper.description: The symbolic meaning of the upper trigram.

lower.description: The symbolic meaning of the lower trigram.

relationship.description: The interpretation arising from the combination or relationship of the two trigrams.

commentary.description: Additional commentary or explanations about the hexagram.
